Articles.Content:
I noticed this when I use the Launcher now.  I tried redownloading but I get the Unity splash screen that says "Personal Edition" on the bottom.  Shouldn't Squad legally be using the Pro edition?

Is this going to degrade gameplay or something by the free version running?  Free versions are usually not as good as the paid ones so I'm not sure if it's just my game or what.  I'm using 1.1.2.  Anyone else have that when they start the game using the launcher?
It would be a legal matter rather than a performance issue. I would hope that Squad have purchased the correct licenses. This may just be an oversight. (Probably a good one to correct...)
